sub_title: Account Manager, Digipac | ✨Storytelling Alchemist | 🌎Founder & CEO, Aether | 📈Customer Growth: +83% | 🔑Aspire Leader, Harvard | 🚀Passionate about entrepreneurship & marketing | ✨Ex-Founder WeeKiddo
summary:
I am a driven individual with an unwavering passion for success. My educational journey began with a full scholarship in Business Administration from Başkent University, where I graduated with honors. Completing the prestigious METU entrepreneurship program further fueled my entrepreneurial aspirations and equipped me with invaluable skills and knowledge.

From the start of my university education, I actively pursued internships and engaged in programs to foster personal and professional growth. These experiences provided practical insights into the business world and a holistic understanding of its dynamics. Active involvement in multiple NGOs honed my leadership and teamwork skills while instilling a sense of social responsibility.

As the visionary Ex-CEO of WeeKiddo, I fearlessly brought my dream venture to life, learning crucial lessons in leadership, resilience, and innovation. Currently excelling as an Account Project Manager at Digipac Consultancy, I consistently deliver outstanding results, refining my strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities.

Seeking knowledge, I pursued opportunities at prestigious institutions like Harvard University (Aspire Leader) and Stanford University (Code in Place). This diverse educational background empowers me to approach challenges with fresh perspectives, driving innovation.

Beyond my professional endeavors, I merge creativity with captivating storytelling as a Content Creator and Podcaster at Sante. Achieving +78% general customer growth, I craft unforgettable experiences, always recognizing room for growth and improvement.

Join me on a transformative journey of redefining success, sparking innovation, and inspiring others. Let's connect and leave a lasting legacy. Together, we can seize boundless possibilities.

profile_positions.description: We're a new creative agency that helps brands tell their stories in a way that connects with audiences and inspires change. We're passionate about sustainable growth, storytelling, and creativity, and we're excited to partner with brands that are making a difference in the world.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
As an Account Project Manager at Digipac Consultancy, I lead projects for esteemed clients including İŞKAR, Guven International Hospital, Imperial College, H&F Council, ITSERV, Adrian Li Mow Ching | F(x), ECA, and TEES. I have successfully facilitated key partnerships with İTÜ Innogate Program, Bilkent Cyberpark, Girişimcilik Vakfı, and Girişim Haberleri. Based in London, England, I work in a hybrid environment, combining the best of remote and on-site collaboration.

Here are the impressive results achieved during my tenure:

- Social Media: Overall, clients experienced a solid 21% growth rate in social media following, as a result of well-executed content strategies and targeted audience engagement.
- Impressions and Reach: Clients witnessed an exceptional growth rate of 100% in impressions and an outstanding 570% increase in reach. These milestones were achieved through strategic content distribution and optimization.
- Partnerships: Overall, the partnership growth rate reached an impressive 100%, as I successfully fostered collaborations with key industry players, including İTÜ Innogate Program, Bilkent Cyberpark, Girişimcilik Vakfı, and Girişim Haberleri.
- Advertising Success: Facebook ads delivered exceptional results, with a remarkable 400% success rate. Google ads and Twitter ads also yielded positive outcomes, achieving success rates of 68% and 72%, respectively. LinkedIn ads proved highly effective, with an impressive success rate of 82%.
- Event Sales: Overall, clients experienced a substantial 92% increase in event sales, showcasing the effectiveness of targeted marketing campaigns and customer acquisition strategies.

With my comprehensive project management skills, digital expertise, and track record of delivering impressive results, I continue to drive growth and success for our clients at Digipac Consultancy.
profile_positions.title: Account Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Aspire Leader at Harvard University, with a permanent position since January 2022.

- Contribute to strategic planning, project management, and team coordination.
- Active participation in interdisciplinary collaborations and innovative initiatives.
- Uphold Harvard University's reputation for excellence and professionalism.
- Stay updated with industry trends and seek personal/professional growth.
- Develop leadership capabilities through the Aspire Leader program.

At Harvard University, utilizing my skills in Financial Accounting, Marketing, Team Management, Business Development, and Leadership. I collaborate with cross-functional teams, contribute to strategic planning, and ensure effective project management and team coordination. Active participation in interdisciplinary collaborations and innovative initiatives is a key aspect of my role. Upholding Harvard University's reputation for excellence and professionalism is of utmost importance to me. I strive to stay updated with industry trends and seek personal and professional growth opportunities. My dedication lies in making a lasting impact in the field of education and research. Through the Aspire Leader program, I continuously develop and enhance my leadership capabilities to drive positive change and contribute to the growth and success of the institution.
profile_positions.title: Aspire Leader

profile_positions.description:
As a proud member of The Female Founder Collective, a global community empowering and supporting women entrepreneurs, I have the privilege of being the FIRST international member accepted into the collective. Here are some key highlights of my involvement:

- Actively engage with fellow female founders and entrepreneurs, sharing experiences, knowledge, and resources to foster collaboration and growth within the community.
- Participate in networking events, workshops, and panel discussions organized by The Female Founder Collective, both online and in-person, to connect with like-minded individuals and gain insights from industry leaders.
- Contribute to the collective's online presence and community engagement by sharing inspiring stories, advice, and expertise through blog posts, social media content, and other communication channels.
- Collaborate with other members to develop initiatives and programs that promote gender equality, diversity, and inclusion in entrepreneurship. Support the collective's mission of creating a supportive ecosystem for women-led businesses.

Serve as a global ambassador for The Female Founder Collective, sharing its mission and values with aspiring women entrepreneurs around the world. Encourage and inspire other women to pursue their entrepreneurial dreams.

Being part of The Female Founder Collective has been an empowering and enriching experience. It has provided me with a platform to connect with inspiring women, access valuable resources, and contribute to the advancement of women in entrepreneurship. I am committed to actively participating in the collective's initiatives and leveraging my international perspective to promote inclusivity and diversity within the community.
profile_positions.title: Member

company.name: Fiverr and Upwork Freelancers (Buyers and Sellers)

profile_positions.company: Fiverr and Upwork Freelancers (Buyers and Sellers)
profile_positions.description:
Specializing in health, restaurants, fashion, music, and entertainment, as well as local stores, I offer freelance digital marketing services on Fiverr, Upwork, and some consultancies (Like Ozkaya Consultancy | London). Achievements include:

- Social Media: Clients saw an average growth rate of 93% in their social media following, through strategic content creation and targeted campaigns.
- Website Traffic: Clients experienced an average growth rate of 184% in website visits, thanks to effective SEO strategies and optimized user experiences.
- Sales Growth: I achieved an average sales growth rate of 48% for clients, by optimizing conversion funnels and running targeted advertising campaigns.
- Email Marketing: Clients enjoyed an average growth rate of 51% in mail subscriptions, as I implemented lead-generation strategies and optimized email campaigns.
- Engagement and Impressions: Clients witnessed an average growth rate of 141% in engagement and 257% in impressions, through compelling content and influencer collaborations.
- Conversion Rates: I achieved an average growth rate of 43% in conversion rates, by analyzing user behavior and implementing data-driven optimization techniques.
- New Client Acquisition: Clients experienced an average growth rate of 68% in acquiring new customers, through targeted marketing strategies and referral programs.

With a data-driven approach and expertise in various digital marketing channels, I provide comprehensive solutions to help businesses thrive.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a dedicated member of the Youth Committee at Arya Women Investment Platform, a renowned platform empowering women in finance and investment, I actively contribute to the organization's mission of promoting gender equality and financial inclusion. Here are some key highlights of my role:

- Collaborate with a diverse group of young professionals to develop and execute initiatives that empower women in finance and investment. Contribute ideas and actively participate in discussions to drive the committee's goals and objectives.
- Engage in research and analysis to identify key challenges and opportunities faced by women in the financial industry. Contribute to the development of strategies and programs aimed at addressing these issues and promoting gender equality in finance.
- Organize and participate in events, workshops, and seminars aimed at educating and empowering young women in finance and investment. Provide valuable insights, knowledge, and resources to support their personal and professional growth in the industry.
- Foster strong relationships with industry professionals, mentors, and leaders in the finance and investment sector. Seek opportunities for networking, mentorship, and career development for young women in the field.

Actively contribute to the platform's online presence and community engagement. Participate in social media campaigns, content creation, and knowledge-sharing initiatives to promote financial literacy and empower women in finance.
- Stay informed about the latest trends, developments, and opportunities in the finance and investment industry. 

My involvement as a member of the Youth Committee at Arya Women Investment Platform has been a fulfilling experience, allowing me to make a meaningful impact in promoting gender equality and empowering women in finance. I am committed to continuing my contribution and advocating for positive change in the industry.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Youth Committeee

profile_positions.description:
As Brand Manager at The Weird Company, a subscription-based e-commerce marketing agency, I played a pivotal role in driving brand success and growth. Here are some key highlights of my contributions:

- Led weekly reporting and social media management for Roja Rugs, Serena Uziyel, and White On White accounts, ensuring consistent brand messaging and optimizing engagement. This resulted in increased brand visibility and customer engagement.
- Developed and executed strategic brand strategies to position clients as industry leaders and drive business growth. Conducted market research, analyzed competitor landscape, and crafted compelling messaging that resonated with target audiences, resulting in enhanced brand recognition and customer loyalty.
- Conducted in-depth market research to identify emerging trends and opportunities in the e-commerce industry. Utilized data-driven insights to develop innovative marketing campaigns, leveraging new technologies and platforms to reach and engage target audiences, driving brand awareness and customer acquisition.
- Monitored key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of brand initiatives and marketing campaigns. Analyzed engagement rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates to gain insights into audience behavior and preferences, enabling continuous optimization and improvement of brand strategies.
- Successfully managed client accounts, establishing strong relationships and delivering exceptional service. Collaborated closely with clients to understand their goals, align brand strategies with their vision, and exceed their expectations.

As Brand Manager, I consistently demonstrated strategic thinking, effective communication, and a results-driven approach. Through my efforts, I made significant contributions to the success and reputation of The Weird Company and our clients, driving brand growth and establishing a strong brand presence in the market.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a Trainee at Oyun ve Uygulama Akademisi, a leading institution in game and application development, I have been actively engaged in enhancing my skills and gaining practical experience in the field. Here are some key highlights of my trainee role:

- Participated in hands-on training programs and workshops focused on game and application development, gaining valuable knowledge and practical skills in various areas of the industry.
- Collaborated with experienced professionals and industry experts, learning from their expertise and receiving guidance in developing my technical skills and understanding of the game and application development process.
- Worked on real-world projects under the supervision of mentors, contributing to the development and implementation of game and application concepts, including design, programming, and testing.
- Actively engaged in team-based projects, fostering effective communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills. Learned to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, adapting to project requirements and deadlines.
- Demonstrated a strong passion for game and application development, continuously seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and explore emerging trends and technologies in the industry.
- Actively participated in discussions, brainstorming sessions, and feedback loops, offering creative ideas and contributing to the overall growth and success of the team and projects.

My experience as a Trainee at Oyun ve Uygulama Akademisi has been instrumental in developing my skills, expanding my knowledge, and preparing me for a career in the game and application development industry. I am committed to continuous learning and growth, and I look forward to applying my acquired skills and knowledge in future endeavors.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.description:
As the Digital Marketing Manager at BeeVision, I played a vital role in enhancing the company's online presence and implementing effective marketing strategies. Highlights include:

- Produced 14 weekly blog posts, positioning BeeVision as an industry leader and engaging our target audience. Result: Enhanced brand authority and increased customer engagement.
- Implemented successful SEO techniques, resulting in a remarkable 257% increase in website traffic. Result: Improved search rankings and expanded organic visibility.
- Led website development, writing, and editing content for sections like "About Us" and "Careers". Result: Communicated BeeVision's value proposition, attracting top talent and enhancing brand reputation.
- Grew BeeVision's LinkedIn presence by 97%, leveraging strategic content creation and networking. Result: Expanded industry connections and increased brand reach.
- Contributed to a 2% increase in overseas sales rates through targeted digital marketing campaigns and lead generation activities. Result: Expanded global market reach and revenue growth.
- Executed the company's first email marketing campaign, using personalization and automation to nurture leads and enhance customer engagement. Result: Strengthened brand loyalty and generated new business opportunities.

As the Digital Marketing Manager at BeeVision, I demonstrated proficiency in content marketing, SEO strategies, website development, and email marketing. Through data-driven decision-making and a focus on delivering exceptional customer experiences, I made a significant impact on BeeVision's growth and market presence.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
YetGen is a 12-week 21st Century Competencies Training Program where pieces of training such as Effective Presentation Techniques, Teamwork, Career Planning, Excel, Information / Media / Finance Literacy, Social Innovation, and the GirişGen process have been organized.

I am completing the assignments given during the Yetkin Gençler Education and Awareness Program, and learning to establish my enterprise with a focus on the UN Sustainable Development Goals within the GirişGen process.

By actively participating in the Yetkin Gençler internship, I have gained valuable knowledge and skills that will contribute to my personal and professional growth. The program has equipped me with the necessary tools and mindset to make a positive impact in my future endeavors, while also addressing important societal issues through entrepreneurship and sustainable development practices.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

Worked as a Design Coordinator, contributing to the activities of the METU R&D Community (METU Research and Development Community). Played a key role in creating engaging and impactful content for the community's initiatives and projects. Used design skills and creativity to effectively communicate ideas and messages to the target audience.

Member: Actively involved as a member of Simurg Derneği, contributing to their initiatives and projects in Istanbul, Turkey since June 2019.

Served as the President of the Members Committee for 1 year, taking part in leadership and organizational responsibilities.

"Generations Hand in Hand" Project Coordinator: Took on the role of a part-time Project Coordinator for the "Generations Hand in Hand" project, facilitating coordination and implementation of activities from Nov 2021 to May 2022.

2C1N - Corporate Communications Specialist: Worked as a part-time Corporate Communications Specialist for 2C1N, contributing to communication strategies and activities from Nov 2020 to Mar 2021.

Volunteered as an Entrepreneurship Trainer with KızBaşına, empowering women through economic empowerment training programs. Within the scope of this program, I gave digital marketing training to women in an environment of economic inequality.
Currently serving as a translator for TED Talks, promoting knowledge sharing and global understanding. I'm trying to support TED Talks with 20+ translations.
Served as a Financial Literacy Trainer, educating individuals on financial literacy and empowerment as a volunteer with Habitat Derneği.
Worked as a Child Rights Trainer, advocating for children's rights and welfare with Toplum Gönüllüleri Vakfı (TOG).
Actively involved as a volunteer in disaster and humanitarian relief efforts with AFAD.
